name: Fran is under 40 on the date of her exam

testSteps.description: Given Fran is a 1st class pilot
Given she was born on 1 March 2000
When she has a medical exam on 20 December 2023
Then her medical certificate will expire on 31 December 2024

userStory.storyName: Determining when a pilot is due for a medical examination
userStory.displayName: Determining when a pilot is due for a medical examination
userStory.narrative:
As a pilot
  I want to know when my medical certificate will expire
  So that I can renew my certificate at the right time and comply with FAA regulations

featureTag.name: Medicals/Determining when a pilot is due for a medical examination
featureTag.displayName: Medicals/Determining when a pilot is due for a medical examination

title: Fran is under 40 on the date of her exam

tags.name: Medicals/Determining when a pilot is due for a medical examination
tags.displayName: Determining when a pilot is due for a medical examination

rule.name: Certificates for 1st class licenses expire after 12 months for pilots under 40 and 6 months for pilots over 40

steps: Given Fran is a 1st class pilot
